audioText: Le boxeur frappé vachement fort s'est relevé courageusement pour continuer le combat malgré sa douleur visible.
question: What happened to the boxer who was hit very hard?
options: He got up courageously to continue fighting despite visible pain
He immediately gave up and left the ring
He called for medical assistance from his corner
He complained angrily to the referee about unfair play
explanation: The text states 'Le boxeur frappé vachement fort s'est relevé courageusement pour continuer le combat malgré sa douleur visible.' - The boxer hit really hard got up courageously to continue the fight despite his visible pain. 'Frappé' is the past participle of 'frapper' (to hit), and 'vachement' means 'really' or 'very' (informal).
